dn20:5.1: anukassami isn’t anukaroti as per PTS dict, but anu-kasati = anu + √kṛṣ as per CPD, see http://sanskritdictionary.com/anukar%E1%B9%A3a%E1%B8%A5/1647/4
dn20:10.3: Speelings in this text follow Anandajoti’s translation of this text, http://www.ancient-buddhist-texts.net/Texts-and-Translations/Safeguard/02x-Atirekani-Sattasuttani-23.htm
dn20:10.9: Comm has “Cittasenoti citto ca seno ca cittaseno ca” but given the singular this seems unlikely.
